tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a planned pregnancy. After conceiving naturally I was consulting a leading doctor at a private hospital. However the experience wasn't great and not to our satisfaction. A friend of mine suggested Dr sathya and we made the right decision of starting to consult him from the 3rd month onwards. His calm demeanor, spending the right amount of time with patients explaining what the next steps are and what to expect , being reachable (most importantly), helped me to have a successful and smooth delivery. I would recommend him very strongly over all other gynaecologists in the city. Simply brilliant. Meet him once and you will know that you have made the right choice.

tags: None
review: We were referred by another doctor. But he took time and understand the complete health situation from scracth.He always looks for the best possible treatment and explain in detail about the pros & cons of each treatment along with success rate. Instead of jumping into conclusion,he asked for a re-analysis.It came out that the previous test was wrong. He gave all the possible option and guided us to select the suitable one. Very calm and approachable person.

tags: None
review: Dr.Sathya is very humble and patient in hearing our symptoms. I am consulting him for my pregnancy and I feel very comfortable in his approach. He explains the logic behind each tests and doesn't insist on taking medicines unless it is really required. He is warm and welcoming & I would definitely recommend him for anyone who asks me for an opinion

tags: None
review: From my experience he is such a good Doctor..He wil tell what is the problem and clearly explains about the pblm and giv a ******* solution. One of the best Obs &Gynec.Treatment is good.I too refereed my friend who is trying for a baby for 3 years..Now she is pregnant...Feeling Happy...

****** *** *** **** **** ** *** ***** A well wisher *** ** ********* ************ * We have decided to complete my entire pregnancy program under his guidance only.we truly trust his excellence.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It's a great experience. I strongly recommend Satya Sir for removal of fibroids and fertility related. He listens the history and guides the proper treatment to patient. The concern and treatment of Doctor, can be justified on the cost spentby us. Besides,  the staff reported to Satya Sir and cloudnine staff overall are good and concerned to the patient and their family members. Sir, THANK YOU SO MUCH. Mrs.Precila Anthony

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Providing feedback after full cycle of ivf which further help you in making decisions.
Charges are very high,  Diagonis was there *** ****** ** ******* ********* Hospital charges us for which they did not have provided any services Means Only egg collection happened but charged us for IVF/ICSI,embryo formation, Embryo transfer, Laser hatching etc. The total Money paid Rs. 99073 + additional charges like consultation,stimulation injections,  test,  scans, registration etc. 
He soiled our life in all the way. Kept under dark by providing partial information *** ****** *** **** ******* **** ********* ** *** ********** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Feeling like some Angel guided us to meet Dr . Sathya . after a long period of treatment and disappointment in other Hospital luckily we came to know about Dr sathya , he gave us a clear view about the treatment and process . he treated us with respect and kindness which we had not experienced in any other fertility hospital doctors .

Usually all commercial fertility hospitals reject previous tests worth of 50000-60000 inr . but Dr sathya took all previous test results in account and reasonably reduced our financial burden . 

Gave us a great clarity about ivf and now we have hope and ready to receive happiness .  it is very rare to find such a doctor in this commercial world .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Sathya explained me more clearly and answered my queries completely. He gave the complete sequel of procedures

review: We where childless couples for 12 years. Thanks to Dr. Sathya my wife is now completing first tremester. Doctors is very humble person, practical, counseling and understanding. Even the hospital staff are good. Definitely recommend it to anyone seeking IVF treatment in Chennai.

review: We had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Satya Balasubramanyam and her staff. The staff was very helpful and kind and always available to help. We had an amazing experience with my first child! Dr. Satya Balasubramyam was fantastic and made us feel at ease the whole time! Everything with the treatment went well. We have a beautiful, healthy baby girl. Thank you to all the doctors and staff that made the whole experience wonderful, from my first visit to the birth!
